use.flag: When compiling in release or debug mode, only add line-tables, not full debug info.
Compile in release-maximum-optimization injected profile (codegen-units=1). Still compatible with debug-line-tables-only.
Depend on gvfs with AFP network shares support.
Depend on gvfs with HTTP/DAV backend support.
Depend on gvfs with NFS network shares support.
Depend on gvfs with Samba network shares support.
